theUnchainedMod:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
theUnchainedMod:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

theUnchainedMod:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
theUnchainedMod:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
theUnchainedMod:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

theUnchainedMod:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
theUnchainedMod:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

theUnchainedMod:DefaultAttackWithVariabl.NAME: Special Strike
theUnchainedMod:DefaultAttackWithVariabl.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !theUnchainedMod:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

theUnchainedMod:DefaultSecondMagicNumber.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
theUnchainedMod:DefaultSecondMagicNumber.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !theUnchainedMod:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.

theUnchainedMod:Unshackling.NAME: Unshackling
theUnchainedMod:Unshackling.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, Upgrade it for the rest of combat.
theUnchainedMod:Unshackling.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you play a card, Upgrade it for the rest of combat.

theUnchainedMod:Whiplash.NAME: Whiplash
theUnchainedMod:Whiplash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL 2 theunchainedmod:Chain: Enemy loses !M! HP.

theUnchainedMod:PlayDead.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Vulnerable. NL !theUnchainedMod:SecondMagic! theunchainedmod:Chain: Gain 1 Intangible.

theUnchainedMod:RecklessSwing.NAME: Reckless Swing
theUnchainedMod:RecklessSwing.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Take !M! theunchainedmod:Relayed_Damage at the end of turn.

theUnchainedMod:ThreeSixty.DESCRIPTION: An enemy loses !M! HP. Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Gain 1 theunchainedmod:Momentum.

theUnchainedMod:QuickSwing.NAME: Quick Swing
theUnchainedMod:QuickSwing.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL 1 theunchainedmod:Chain: Draw !M! cards.

theUnchainedMod:StepBack.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL 1 theunchainedmod:Chain: Gain !B! Block.

theUnchainedMod:HiddenBlade.NAME: Hidden Blade
theUnchainedMod:HiddenBlade.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust.

theUnchainedMod:HalfSwing.NAME: Half Swing
theUnchainedMod:HalfSwing.DESCRIPTION: An enemy loses !M! HP. Deal !D! damage to a random enemy. NL Gain 1 theunchainedmod:Momentum.

theUnchainedMod:TieTogether.NAME: Tie Together
theUnchainedMod:TieTogether.DESCRIPTION: theunchainedmod:Relay !M! damage. NL Everytime the player takes damage, the enemy loses HP equal to the same amount. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I cannot be tied to multiple enemies.

theUnchainedMod:Liberation.NAME: Liberation
theUnchainedMod:Liberation.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Finish all your active theunchainedmod:Chains.

theUnchainedMod:ClenchTeeth.NAME: Clench Teeth
theUnchainedMod:ClenchTeeth.DESCRIPTION: Everytime you are debuffed during your turn, gain !M! Block. NL 1 theunchainedmod:Chain: Gain !theUnchainedMod:SecondMagic! more.

theUnchainedMod:NonDominantHand.NAME: Non-dominant Hand
theUnchainedMod:NonDominantHand.DESCRIPTION: Enemy loses !M! HP for every Weak you have.

theUnchainedMod:Cower.NAME: Cower
theUnchainedMod:Cower.DESCRIPTION: theunchainedmod:Relay !M! damage. NL Gain 2 Frail. NL Apply !theUnchainedMod:SecondMagic! Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

theUnchainedMod:MorningStar.NAME: Morning Star
theUnchainedMod:MorningStar.DESCRIPTION: Costs 1 less [E] for every 2-cost card played this combat. Enemy loses !M! HP. NL Set Cost to 4 after playing.

theUnchainedMod:Cruiserweight.NAME: Cruiserweight
theUnchainedMod:Cruiserweight.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a 2-cost card, draw 1 card.
theUnchainedMod:Cruiserweight.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a 2-cost card, draw 2 cards.

theUnchainedMod:Kusarigama.NAME: Kusarigama
theUnchainedMod:Kusarigama.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if it would finish an Attack theunchainedmod:Chain. Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I need to finish an Attack Chain with this.

theUnchainedMod:KeepDistance.NAME: Keep Distance
theUnchainedMod:KeepDistance.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. ALL enemies gain !M! Block.

theUnchainedMod:MuscleMemory.NAME: Muscle Memory
theUnchainedMod:MuscleMemory.DESCRIPTION: This turn, your next 2-cost card is played twice.
theUnchainedMod:MuscleMemory.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This turn, your next 2 2-cost cards are played twice.

theUnchainedMod:SliceThrough.NAME: Slice Through
theUnchainedMod:SliceThrough.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If not Fatal, gain !M! Weak.

theUnchainedMod:Reschedule.NAME: Reschedule
theUnchainedMod:Reschedule.DESCRIPTION: Remove ALL theunchainedmod:Relayed_Damage you would take next turn. ALL theunchainedmod:Relayed_Damage you would take this turn, is dealt to you next turn.

theUnchainedMod:EndlessPatience.NAME: Endless Patience
theUnchainedMod:EndlessPatience.DESCRIPTION: theunchainedmod:Relay !M! damage. theunchainedmod:Relayed_Damage can be theunchainedmod:relayed again.
theUnchainedMod:EndlessPatience.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL theunchainedmod:Relay !M! damage. theunchainedmod:Relayed_Damage can be theunchainedmod:relayed again.

theUnchainedMod:SharedBurden.NAME: Shared Burden
theUnchainedMod:SharedBurden.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Weak. Apply !theUnchainedMod:SecondMagic! Weak to ALL enemies.

theUnchainedMod:Swirl.NAME: Swirl
theUnchainedMod:Swirl.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Retain. Gain 1 theunchainedmod:Full_Spin. Exhaust.
theUnchainedMod:Swirl.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Retain. Gain 1 theunchainedmod:Momentum and 1 theunchainedmod:Full_Spin. Exhaust.

theUnchainedMod:PerfectExecution.NAME: Perfect Execution
theUnchainedMod:PerfectExecution.DESCRIPTION: Add a random 2-cost card into your hand. It costs !M! this turn. NL Exhaust.

theUnchainedMod:TunnelVision.NAME: Tunnel Vision
theUnchainedMod:TunnelVision.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! theunchainedmod:Relayed_Damage whenever you play an attack. 1 theunchainedmod:Chain: Lose !theUnchainedMod:SecondMagic! more.

theUnchainedMod:RipOutHeart.NAME: Rip Out Heart
theUnchainedMod:RipOutHeart.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Lose all your Block. NL End your turn. NL Exhaust.

theUnchainedMod:SolarPlexus.NAME: Solar Plexus
theUnchainedMod:SolarPlexus.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL !theUnchainedMod:SecondMagic! theunchainedmod:Chain: Stun. NL Exhaust.

theUnchainedMod:BreakFree.NAME: Break Free
theUnchainedMod:BreakFree.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. Remove your Weak, Frail and Vulnerable. Gain [E] for every Debuff removed. NL Exhaust.
theUnchainedMod:BreakFree.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. Remove ALL your debuffs. Gain [E] for every Debuff removed. NL Exhaust.

theUnchainedMod:Burnish.NAME: Burnish
theUnchainedMod:Burnish.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card. Gain theunchainedmod:Momentum equal to double its cost.

theUnchainedMod:SecretReserves.NAME: Secret Reserves
theUnchainedMod:SecretReserves.DESCRIPTION: Gain Strength equal to your Frail. NL Lose all your Frail. NL Exhaust.

theUnchainedMod:SharePain.NAME: Share Pain

theUnchainedMod:SharePain.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !theUnchainedMod:SecondMagic! times. NL Damage is equal to ALL theunchainedmod:Relayed_Damage you gained this combat.

theUnchainedMod:DiveIntoFray.NAME: Dive Into Fray
theUnchainedMod:DiveIntoFray.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E]. NL Take !M! theunchainedmod:Relayed_Damage at the end of turn. NL Exhaust.
theUnchainedMod:DiveIntoFray.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E] [E]. NL Take !M! theunchainedmod:Relayed_Damage at the end of turn. NL Exhaust.

theUnchainedMod:Ballet.NAME: Ballet
theUnchainedMod:Ballet.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain !M! theunchainedmod:Momentum. NL Swirls hit ALL enemies.

theUnchainedMod:OverHeadSwing.NAME: Over Head Swing
theUnchainedMod:OverHeadSwing.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL If you have an active theunchainedmod:Chain end your turn.

theUnchainedMod:SingleOut.NAME: Single Out
theUnchainedMod:SingleOut.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL A random enemy gains !M! Block.

theUnchainedMod:RelentlessBattery.NAME: Relentless Battery
theUnchainedMod:RelentlessBattery.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL 1 theunchainedmod:Chain: Deal !D! damage !M! times and reapply this theunchainedmod:Chain. NL Exhaust.

theUnchainedMod:StareDown.NAME: Stare Down
theUnchainedMod:StareDown.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] for every enemy that is blocking. ALL enemies lose !M! Block.
theUnchainedMod:StareDown.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] if ALL enemies are blocking and [E] for every enemy that is blocking. ALL enemies lose !M! Block.

theUnchainedMod:EnclosingSteel.NAME: Enclosing Steel
theUnchainedMod:EnclosingSteel.DESCRIPTION: theunchainedmod:Relay !M! damage. Your theunchainedmod:Relay does not wear off at the start of next turn.

theUnchainedMod:BloodySwing.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Remove up to !M! theunchainedmod:Relayed_Damage and deal damage equal to the amount you removed.

theUnchainedMod:Baguazhang.NAME: Baguazhang
theUnchainedMod:Baguazhang.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy intents to do less than !M! damage, Block !B!.

theUnchainedMod:SharpSplittings.NAME: Sharp Splittings
theUnchainedMod:SharpSplittings.DESCRIPTION: Gain !theUnchainedMod:SecondMagic! Frail. Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. Apply !M! Vulnerable and !M! Weak to ALL enemies.

theUnchainedMod:HeavyShackles.NAME: Heavy Shackles
theUnchainedMod:HeavyShackles.DESCRIPTION: ALL 2-cost cards cost zero once per turn.
theUnchainedMod:HeavyShackles.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ALL 2-cost cards cost zero and are upgraded once per turn.

theUnchainedMod:WreckingBall.NAME: Wrecking Ball
theUnchainedMod:WreckingBall.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies gain !theUnchainedMod:SecondMagic! Block. 2 theunchainedmod:Chain: ALL enemies lose !M! HP.

theUnchainedMod:SwipeArmor.NAME: Swipe Armor
theUnchainedMod:SwipeArmor.DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to the amount of Block ALL enemies have.
theUnchainedMod:SwipeArmor.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to double the amount of Block ALL enemies have.

theUnchainedMod:LongerChains.NAME: Longer Chains
theUnchainedMod:LongerChains.DESCRIPTION: At the start of turn, draw !M! additional cards. All enemies gain !theUnchainedMod:SecondMagic! Block every turn.

theUnchainedMod:Hobbles.NAME: Hobbles
theUnchainedMod:Hobbles.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Deal !D! damage. NL !theUnchainedMod:SecondMagic! theunchainedmod:Chain: Apply !M! Weak. NL Retain. NL Exhaust.

theUnchainedMod:GlimpseIntoFuture.NAME: Glimpse into Future
theUnchainedMod:GlimpseIntoFuture.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If you end this turn with more than 0 [E] , gain !M! [E] next turn.

theUnchainedMod:LongGame.NAME: Long Game
theUnchainedMod:LongGame.DESCRIPTION: theunchainedmod:Relay !M! damage. NL If you are Frail, theunchainedmod:Relay !M! damage again and draw 1 additional card next turn.

theUnchainedMod:Pirouette.NAME: Pirouette
theUnchainedMod:Pirouette.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! theunchainedmod:Momentum. NL Add a Swirl into your hand. NL Exhaust.

theUnchainedMod:FreeForm.NAME: Free Form
theUnchainedMod:FreeForm.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL ALL Chains are finished instantly.

theUnchainedMod:Wink.NAME: Wink
theUnchainedMod:Wink.DESCRIPTION: Enemy gains !M! Block. NL Draw !theUnchainedMod:SecondMagic! cards.

theUnchainedMod:Spin.NAME: Spin
theUnchainedMod:Spin.DESCRIPTION: Gain X theunchainedmod:Momentum times 2. NL Exhaust.

theUnchainedMod:PeaceOffering.NAME: Peace Offering
theUnchainedMod:PeaceOffering.DESCRIPTION: Double your theunchainedmod:Relay. Double the Block of ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.
theUnchainedMod:PeaceOffering.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Double your theunchainedmod:Relay. Double the Block of ALL enemies.

theUnchainedMod:Suffocate.NAME: Suffocate
theUnchainedMod:Suffocate.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose HP equal to double their Block.

theUnchainedMod:EscapeRope.NAME: Escape Rope
theUnchainedMod:EscapeRope.DESCRIPTION: If you have an active Chain, take an extra turn after this turn. End your turn. NL Exhaust.
theUnchainedMod:EscapeRope.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: If you have an active Chain, take an extra turn after this turn. End your turn.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I need an active Chain to play this.

theUnchainedMod:LawOfInertia.NAME: Law Of Inertia
theUnchainedMod:LawOfInertia.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, lose !M! Strength and Dexterity. Whenever you finish a theunchainedmod:Chain gain !theUnchainedMod:SecondMagic! Strength and Dexterity.

theUnchainedMod:Swathe.NAME: Swathe
theUnchainedMod:Swathe.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. !theUnchainedMod:SecondMagic! theunchainedmod:Chain: the same enemy gains !M! Block.

theUnchainedMod:BlindSwing.NAME: Blind Swing
theUnchainedMod:BlindSwing.DESCRIPTION: Enemy loses !M! HP. NL 1 theunchainedmod:Chain: Gain !theUnchainedMod:SecondMagic! Weak.

theUnchainedMod:LastResort.NAME: Last Resort
theUnchainedMod:LastResort.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Gain [E] [E]. !theUnchainedMod:SecondMagic! theunchainedmod:Chain: Lose ALL your [E]. NL Exhaust.

theUnchainedMod:DiamondSaw.NAME: Diamond Saw
theUnchainedMod:DiamondSaw.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Delete ALL your active theunchainedmod:Chains.

theUnchainedMod:ReinforcedElement.NAME: Reinforced Element
theUnchainedMod:ReinforcedElement.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. If you have an active theunchainedmod:Chain, gain [E] and draw 1 card.

theUnchainedMod:GraspIntoFuture.DESCRIPTION: Copy a card and put the copy on top of your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
theUnchainedMod:GraspIntoFuture.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Copy a card two times and put the copies on top of your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

theUnchainedMod:SpinningWheel.NAME: Spinning Wheel
theUnchainedMod:SpinningWheel.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Gain !B! Block. !theUnchainedMod:SecondMagic! theunchainedmod:Chain: gain !M! theunchainedmod:Momentum.
